jump_scares.spoiler: Beverly walks into her husband as she packs her belongings
We see dead bodies littering the Derry sewer runoff when suddenly Henry Bowers face appears out of the water
Henry tries to dislodge the balloon under his bed but it pops to reveal the corpse of Patrick Hockstetter behind it
A sudden cut to a gong (as Richie is hugging Bev) being hit may startle some viewers
During an encounter with Pennywise under the bleachers, a girl says “you’re supposed to say 3” and is immediately devoured by Pennywise
A naked monstrous woman runs out at Beverly
The giant statue suddenly appears right beside Richie as he sits on the park bench
Richie closes his eyes and says “it isn’t real”, when he opens them Pennywise suddenly runs at him
A corpse-like hand suddenly grabs Bill when he reaches down to grab Georgie
During the classroom scene, as Beverley says “no matter how many stupid poems you write”, Ben turns around and Beverley’s head is now on fire
Pennywise is suddenly behind Ben in the locker
In present day, Eddie pulls the curtain back but nothing is behind there, he turns around and is suddenly attacked by the rotting corpse
Eddie is washing his face. He adjusts the mirror to reveal Henry Bowers standing behind him
Bill collides with one of the inflatable clowns as he tries to follow the boy into the house of mirrors
As Mike lowers the book he is reading, he is suddenly attacked by Henry Bowers
The Stanley-spider suddenly runs at Richie
As Beverly says “I thought I heard something” a corpse pops up out of the water in front of her
The loud pop as a giant balloon bursts may startle some viewers
Beverly turns her torch on, then immediately shines it on Pennywise
After Eddie says “That’s a good boy”, the Pomeranian dog suddenly transforms into a monster
Georgie turns his head to reveal a corpse-like face
Mike runs into Pennywise
Eddie is impaled by one of Pennywises’s claws after he says “I think I killed him for real”
A now shriveled up Pennywise roars and lunges at Mike as he reaches out to touch him
